DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is evaluation of expression of desmin in cardiomyocytes of patients with idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy. Analysis of relationship between desmin expression and activities of mitochondrium and expression of ubiquitin.
DOC.brief_title: Relationship Between Abnormalities of Desmin Cytoskeleton, Mitochondrial Activity and Expression of Ubiquitin in Aspect of Pathogenesis of Heart Failure and Prognosis
DOC.criteria: idiopatic dilated cardiomyopathy, NYHA I, II, III, IV dilated left ventricle ejection fraction below 45% diabetes mellitus kidney failure (GFR < 30, creatinine below 2,5 mg/dl
